solution_line_template: If each of the {num_customers} customers bought {marbles_per_customer} marbles, then they bought {num_customers}*{marbles_per_customer} = <<{num_customers}*{marbles_per_customer}={marbles_sold}>>{marbles_sold} marbles in total from Mr Julien's store.
The number of marbles remaining in the store is {marbles_initial}-{marbles_sold} = <<{marbles_initial}-{marbles_sold}={marbles_remaining}>>{marbles_remaining} marbles
